title: Co-Opportunity
description: Renovated in May 2011, this is a member-owned cooperative market that is open to the public. Stocks fresh organic fruit and vegetable, a large selection of bulk staple, frozen and refrigerated food, vitamins, supplements, snacks, basic cooking items, grocery, and more. Has a full-service deli, hot food and salad bar, coffee and fresh juice bar. The grab-n-go case features many raw food items. Small seating area outside. Parking lot onsite.
